scripts.cms:pull: directus-to-data --collection-output src/_data/{{collectionName}}.json --assets-output src/assets/{{filename}} -c AFAOrganisations -c AFAStickers:*,image.* -c AFALinks:title,entries -c AFAWatchpigeonParties:*,logo.filename_download,logo.id -c AFAWatchpigeonArticles:*,subjects.AFAWatchpigeonSubjects_id.id,subjects.AFAWatchpigeonSubjects_id.name,subjects.AFAWatchpigeonSubjects_id.description,responses.party.id,responses.party.logo.id,responses.party.logo.filename_download,responses.score,responses.note -c AFAWatchpigeonSubjects

scripts.cms:schema:restore: directus-to-data --restore-schema .directus.schema.json --collection-output NO_WRITE --assets-output NO_WRITE -c AFAOrganisations -c AFAStickers -c AFALinks -c AFAWatchpigeonSubjects -c AFAWatchpigeonParties -c AFAWatchpigeonArticles -c AFAWatchpigeonResponses -c AFAWatchpigeonArticles_AFAWatchpigeonSubjects
scripts.cms:schema:apply: directus-to-data --restore-schema .directus.schema.json --collection-output NO_WRITE --assets-output NO_WRITE --apply-schema -c AFAOrganisations -c AFAStickers -c AFALinks -c AFAWatchpigeonSubjects -c AFAWatchpigeonParties -c AFAWatchpigeonArticles -c AFAWatchpigeonResponses -c AFAWatchpigeonArticles_AFAWatchpigeonSubjects
